backend/main.mo: Defines investment plans, AI insights, and leads with default data stored in maps and comparison helpers for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all frontend components, hooks, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, dark mode styles, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, fonts, favicon, and root app mount point.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon featuring a red geometric emblem on a black rounded square.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal root component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/insights/AIInsig: Fetches and displays AI insights with loading, error handling, color-coded impact indicators, and a demo disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/site/AnalyticsPr: Shows animated performance metrics, a demo disclaimer, and a sixâ€‘month chart with trend cards.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Contact form with validation, lead submission, state management, and optional admin lead viewer.
Renders a FAQ section using an accordion with predefined questions and answers about the AI investment platform.
frontend/src/components/site/FeaturesSec: Displays a grid of feature cards highlighting key AI capabilities and security aspects of the platform.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Creates the landing hero area with background visuals, headline, CTAs, and key platform stats.
frontend/src/components/site/PricingSect: Fetches and displays investment plans with loading, error, and featured plan states, including CTAs to contact.
Provides footer content with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and a disclaimer.
Implements a responsive header with navigation links, mobile menu, and smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIInsights.ts: Defines a React Query hook that retrieves AI insights from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvestmentPlans.ts: Fetches investment plans from the backend actor using React Query when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Loads backend lead entries when enabled and when the actor is initialized.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead data through the backend actor and invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, accessibility utilities, and custom visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the main marketing landing page from multiple site sections and components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, typography, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, issues, and state for the NexaProfit build.
